resources.string:
Beta version:
 · New: Auto rotate for Google Maps (experimental)
 · New: Ability to create user defined caches
 · New: Proximity notification messages as Android system notifications
 · New: Add support for geocheckers of geocache-planer.de and geotjek.dk
 · New: Option to disable Google Maps controls for manual screen rotation
 · New: Support cache type "Locationless (Reverse) Geocache" (no logging support yet)
 · New: Show current elevation in compass
 · Change: Use waypoints of a user defined cache in "Go to" menu (instead of the old "Go to" history)
 · Change: Link from offline map "More info" page to the new offline map tutorial
 · Change: Updated compatibility libraries from support libraries to AndroidX
 · Fix: Accidental outzoom to world map when opening Google Maps cache map
 · Fix: Initial zoom on cache map not covering its waypoints
 · Fix: Internal code corrections and optimizations
 · Fix: Support for geochecker gc-apps.com
 · Fix: Internal database cleanup improvements
 · Fix: Removed no longer used menu entry "Cache list" - "Show on map" - "Mapsforge Beta"
 · Fix: Ignore waypoint threshold setting when on a single cache OSM map
 · Fix: Improved error message when wrong offline map version is used
